DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.TWC_XML_MESSAGE: Select PON,VER,SUP,ACT,VALIDATION_STATUS,MESSAGE_TYPE from TWC_XML_MESSAGE where PON = $PON and VER = $VER
DATABASE.VOIP_XML_MESSAGE: Select MESSAGE_TYPE from VOIP_XML_MESSAGE where PON = $PON and VER = $VER
DATABASE.TWC_ORDER_STATUS: Select STATUS from TWC_ORDER_STATUS where PON = $PON and VER = $VER

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.BWC_REQUEST_MESSAGE: Select PON,VER,SUP,CUSTOMER_NAME,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,EVENT from BWC_REQUEST_MESSAGE where PON = $PON and VER = $VER
DATABASE.BWC_RESPONSE_MESSAGE: Select PON,VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER_NAME,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE from BWC_RESPONSE_MESSAGE where PON = $PON and VER = $VER

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.BWC_REQUEST_MESSAGE: Select VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER_NAME,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN_COUNT,DELIVERY_STATUS from BWC_REQUEST_MESSAGE where PON = $PON or ATN=$TN
DATABASE.BWC_RESPONSE_MESSAGE: Select EVENT from BWC_RESPONSE_MESSAGE where PON = $PON

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.AN_XML_MESSAGE: Select message_type, delivery_status ,ver ,sup from AN_XML_MESSAGE where PON = $PON

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE: Select VER,SUP,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,EVENT,ENQUEUE_STATUS,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID or TN=$TN

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.ASR_RESPONSE_MESSAGE: Select DELIVERY_STATUS,TYPE,RECIPIENT from ASR_RESPONSE_STATUS where MESSAGEKEY =$MESSAGEKEY

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE: Select VER,SUP,EVENT,CUSTOMER,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID and VER =$VER
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE_ICP_CONFIRMED_1: Select VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID and VER =$VER and SOURCE = 'neustar' and EVENT = 'icp_valid'
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE_ICP_CONFIRMED_2: Select VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID and VER =$VER and SOURCE = 'neustar' and EVENT = 'icp_confirmed'
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE_ICP_FAILED: Select VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID and VER =$VER and SOURCE = 'neustar' and EVENT = 'icp_failed'
DATABASE.ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE_ICP_VALID: Select VER,EVENT,CUSTOMER,ORDER_TYPE,ORDER_SUBTYPE,ENQUEUE_STATUS,TN,DELIVERY_STATUS from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID =$ORDERID and VER =$VER and SOURCE = 'amdocs' and EVENT = 'icp_valid'

DATABASE.name: ADAPTER
DATABASE.SOA_ESR_TN: Select STATUS from SOA_ESR_TN where ORDERID=$ORDERID
DATABASE.PORT_PS_INFO: Select SVEXIST,TNSTATUS from PORT_PS_INFO where ORDERID=$ORDERID
DATABASE.SOA_XML_MESSAGE: Select SUB_REQUEST_TYPE,DELIVERY_STATUS from SOA_XML_MESSAGE where ORDERID=$ORDERID
DATABASE.POST_XML_MESSAGE: Select EVENT from POST_XML_MESSAGE where ORDERID=$ORDERID
